title: Novice Buddhist monks ordained
body_lines: An ordination ceremony held at the Sri Dharmaloka Temple in Bandaragama today, where three young boys were ordained as monks. The ceremony was organised by Ven. Dr. Thalgampala Paduma Thera with the patronage of the Kotte Sri Kalyani Samagri Maha Sanga Sabha Anunayake, Ven. Prof. Kotapitiye Rahula Thera. Pix by Samantha Perera
